Description: Glazed composition shabti of Padiamun (? or Padiamennebnesuttawy) with a lappet-wig(damaged), a modelled face with a beard and large joined hands in relief; the front of the leg section is inscribed with black painted hieroglyphs; there is a back-pillar; the foot has broken away.
Acquisition name: Purchased from: Somerset Lowry-Corry, 2nd Earl of Belmore (perhaps)
